Package gov.anl.ipns.Util.Messaging.Information

Interface Summary
InformationHandler Classes that implement this interface have the ability to be registered with a InformationCenter object as being able to store data that is aliased by string keys.
 

Class Summary
InformationCenter This class acts as a central warehouse of data that is shared by several different InformationHandler objects.
